article_text:
The two lawmen that Mayor-elect Bill de Blasio has publicly mentioned as candidates to succeed New York City Police Commissioner Raymond Kelly would likely go about overhauling the department in different ways.

Former New York Police Department Commissioner Bill Bratton and the current Chief of Department Philip Banks III have both been praised by Mr. de Blasio, who has said they are on his short list.

An...

article_summary:
Former New York Police Department Commissioner Bill Bratton and the current Chief of Department Philip Banks III have both been praised by Mr. de Blasio, who has said they are on his short list.
The two lawmen that Mayor-elect Bill de Blasio has publicly mentioned as candidates to succeed New York City Police Commissioner Raymond Kelly would likely go about overhauling the department in different ways.
